name: Nightmare pills
description:
this is a very simple mini-game in which you have to match the colors of the calming pill with the color of the alien that came to get it.

Submitted as part of the Ludum dare October 2021.

Top part of the pill coresponds to the head bottom part to the body. You can click on either part of the pill to modify its color.

ESCAPE - Menu

Everything else are buttons
